nodes.text: Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 1: Weight Training

Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 1: Weight Training is the first in the Planet Hoppers Carida: Heavy Duty article series, written by Cory J. Herndon and released on Wizards.com on September 4, 2003. The story involves Imperial Cadets Myrette Davani and Shira Brie during their Imperial Army training on Carida.
